transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan, good afternoon sir, mein Aasim Khan bol raha tha IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Ji, bas badhiya hain sir.
Customer: Sir abhi, toh kuch din pehle meri aapse baat hui thi aur maine na Aditi ka, Aman ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Jab aapne service li thi, abhi mein dekh raha tha aapka ek email bhi aaya hua tha customer care par taraf.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Toh sir maine usi din jab meri aapse baat hui thi, kya kehte hain abhi teen, chaar, paanch din pehle, maine usi din unko email bhi kiya tha Aditi ji aur Aman ko. Ji ne mujhe bataya tha sir is tarah se unhone ki aapko commitment diya nahi tha ki itni number of calls aapko milengi, kya kehte hain sirf calls se hi aapka buyleads aa jayega.
Executive: Dekhiye, maine us din bhi bataya tha, mein abhi bhi bata raha hu, dekho mein is baare mein na toh behas karna chahta, na mein behas kar sakta.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mujhe kul mila ke yeh hai, kyuki dekho mein, maine aapko bataya tha ki buyleads consume karne ke liye hamesha baitha nahi reh sakta. Aur buyleads jo hain na out of stock ho jaati hain bohot jaldi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh usi baad maine jab yeh plan liya tha aapka na, yeh maine, che mahine pehle bhi use kar chuka hu mein aapka plan.
Customer: Woh toh aapne shayad monthly chalaya tha na, monthly service chalai thi woh toh aapne.
Executive: Sir maine koi bhi service chalai thi lekin.
Customer: Haan yaha pe bhi bol raha hai service chalai thi IndiaMART correct correct, correct correct, sahi baat hai aapki.
Executive: Mujhe waha pe business nahi mila, bhai, aur mujhe yaha pe bhi koi business nahi milta dikh raha abhi tak, bhai bees din ho chuke hain mota moti.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Dus se bees din ho chuke hain. Sir mein dekho na mein yeh keh raha ki kisne mujhe kya kyuki yeh bohot lambi behas hai aur chalti jayegi samay barbaad karne wali cheez hai. Theek hai, bas maine apna mann bana liya hai, aap please meri service band kara dijiye. Kyuki dekho mein.
Executive: Sir dekho service band karne ka mein aapko batau, sir sorry mein aapko beech mein rok raha hu, service band karne ka kuch nahi hai, woh mein sir unse maine unko call bhi karwaya but kya hota na IndiaMART mein sir refund policy hoti nahi hai. Isiliye maine sir unse aapko call bhi karwaya taaki jo beech mein gap hai ya jo miscommunication jo aapko lag raha hai woh clear ho sake aur aage kaam kare kyuki sir aapki industry mein jaise mein dekh raha hu aap thodi bohot jo buyleads mil rahi hain woh aap use bhi kar rahe hain aur acche se agar use karenge toh possibility zyada rahegi waha milne ki sir.
Customer: Bhai yeh nahi hoti na jo kaam ki buyleads hain woh haath nahi lagti, dusri baat mein clear bata du maine jo plan liya tha calls ke chakkar mein liya tha buyleads ke chakkar mein liya hi nahi tha. Agar mujhe aap log yeh bata dete ki yeh bhi plan aapka buyleads pe hi woh hai depend toh mein plan hi nahi leta.
Executive: Buyleads ka toh sir dekho yeh rehta hai sir kya hota na dekho.
Customer: Mein use kar raha hu lekin maine aapko us din bhi bataya mein 24 ghante phone ke ek ek second ke liye nahi baith sakta, dusri baat mein jo jitna kar bhi pata hu utna bhi karu, kai baar aisa bhi hota hai ki buyleads aayi, maine click kiya turant aate hi aur woh 50 second ya 20 second pehle khatam ho gayi. Toh mujhe kya benefit hai uska?
Executive: Kuch buyleads sir aisi hoti hain, kuch buyleads sir aisi hoti hain jo high sold category hoti hain, woh within a second ya within a five second ya 10 second mein bhi ho jaati hain.
Customer: Unko high response wali hain wohi har aadmi ko chahiye. Warna paanch hazaar ki almari bechne toh mein Modinagar se Delhi jaunga nahi. Hai na? Na koi mujhse lega, maan lo mein kisi ko call kar raha hu Delhi mein Noida mein kya aap mujhse almira de dijiye woh 11 hazaar ki almira mujhse nahi mangayega kyu? Kyuki usse zyada uska mera conveyance lag jayega.
Executive: Sir aap alag jagah sahi baat hai aapki baat toh sahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi toh usme se kuch customer aapko aise bhi toh sir milte ho, sorry mein lekin meri baat suniye sir meri baat suniye Aasim ji, aisa hai yeh woh mudda hai jo shayad kabhi khatam nahi ho sakti woh behas hai yeh. Hai na?
Executive: Are nahi sir aisa nahi hai sir.
Customer: Maine aapko clear, nahi nahi aisa hi hai dekhiye mein mein aapko batau mein kaafi manipulate pehle hi ho chuka hu, ab mein nahi ho paunga kyu? Maine che mahine ki service band karane ke liye call ki thi last month isse pehle toh mujhe bola gaya ji ab toh cut chuka hai ab toh is mahine toh nahi hogi, agle mahine mein band karata usse pehle sir dekhiye aap TrustSeal le lijiye usme aapko benefits mil rahe hain calls aayengi. Chalo ji ab maine TrustSeal le liye, phir bohot saari cheeze ab mein uske baad jaana chahta hu ab aap mujhe samjha rahe hain bhai ek aadmi ek baar do baar chaar baar manipulate ho sakta hai baar baar nahi hoga pehli cheez, dusri baat sir dekhiye aisa toh nahi hai ki refund policy nahi hai. Theek hai, agar aap service proper nahi de pa rahe calls nahi aa pa rahi mujhe response nahi mil raha toh aisa koi bhi company yeh nahi keh sakti ki aapne hume ek baar pay kar diya aapne service li humse dus din ki hum aapke paise kaatenge itne din ke, theek hai? Aisa koi nahi hota aap dekho mein isme aapka.
Executive: Mein aapka paisa thoda woh karna nahi chahta, haan boliye boliye.
Customer: Haan aisa hai, jaise aapne mujhe yeh baat boli na sir, sir jo mein aapko yeh nahi keh raha full amount, maine dus din aapki use ki hai, aap dus din ka 365 mein se divide kijiye, meri refund kijiye.
Executive: Sir jo aap baat mere ko bol rahe hain, maine aage unko wohi escalate kiya hai lekin sir jinhone sell kiya hai bina unki authority ke toh sir koi bhi insaan aage initiative nahi le sakta. Maine isiliye sir unko call bhi karwaya tha mujhe laga shayad aapki baat ho.
Customer: Kin kin kin kin kin ki authority ke liye?
Executive: Aman ji ki.
Customer: Aman and Aditi.
Executive: Sir dekhiye mein batau Aman ji toh kya hai meri night mein baat hui hai phir mudda banta hai, woh toh matlab banda response hi nahi karna chahta woh toh ek tarah se palla jhaad rahe hain aap.
Customer: Nahi aisa nahi kyu nahi karega?
Executive: Sir response jab unko unke saath proper authority jo hai unke, mein do do ghante unse baat kar raha hu, woh aisa nahi hai ji yeh nahi hai humne nahi bola aapko toh usne bola aapko toh usne bola, hai na? Ab mein is cheez mein nahi uljha reh sakta mujhe Aman ne bola mujhe Aditi ne bola mujhe aaj hi Aasim ji ne bola, hai na? Toh mein toh IndiaMART ko jaanta hu. Hai na? Mein toh IndiaMART ko jaanta hu, na mein personally aapko jaanta hu sir, na mein personally Aman ji ko jaanta hu.
Executive: Bilkul sir sahi baat hai.
Customer: Hai na? Toh aap log beech mein apna kijiye kaise hona hai kya hai, kya sequence hai, kya procedure hai. Ab dekhiye dekhiye sir aisa toh nahi hai mein aapko clear bata du ki aisa toh nahi hoga ki aap mujhse chahe ki mein plan kyuki mein mann bana chuka hu plan toh mujhe nahi chalana aapka. Theek hai? Toh sir aap ek baar unse baat, mein unse call arrange karwa raha hu ek baar aap baat karke woh mere ko.
Executive: Mein unse baat nahi karta, mein batau aapko, raat bhi Aman ji mujhse baat kar rahe the, woh toh pata nahi speaker khol ke kisko toh bas sunaate suna rahe the, theek hai? Woh toh ek matlab jaise banawat type mein baat hoti hai na jo mein matlab ek tarah se bana kar baatein bolna, us tarah se baatein bol rahe the woh toh, kuch matlab recorded statement. Hai na? Toh mein wohi kehna chahunga aapko ki thoda.
Executive: Toh mein aisa karta hu aap mujhe thoda time do mein unke ek baar senior se baat karke phir mein aapko batata hu, thoda sa samay do mujhe ek se do din ka.
Customer: Dekhiye meri baat suniye sir, mein customer care pe isiliye mail dala hai, aap log apna matter hai aapas mein suljhaye kaun dega kaun nahi dega refund aur refund ka process karega yeh, mein plan clearly aapko ek cheez bata du clearly 99.9% nahi 101% plan mein nahi continue karne wala chahe mujhe koi Mahatma bhi aake samjhaye ki haan ji abhi response dega kyuki mujhe response nahi dikh raha pehle che mahine mein.
Executive: Theek hai mein sir ek baar unko update, mein ek baar unke head ko update kar deta hu woh definitely sir aapko bata denge, mein aapko bata dunga, theek hai ek se do din ka time do mujhe.
Customer: Mujhe refund hi chahiye, na mein catalog mein kuch update chaah raha hu, na mein woh chaah raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir mein aapki baat ko samajh gaya aap mujhe ek se do din ka time dijiye mein aapko update karta hu.
Customer: Haan ji bilkul, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription.

- Dissatisfied with the buyleads quality.

- Claims plan was sold based on call volume.

Resolution:

- Executive will escalate to head for resolution.

- Explained no refund policy in IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update in 1-2 days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, calls
